trigger.condition: (() => {      let process_status = currentControl.parent.get('process_status').value;     console.log(process_status);     if (process_status === '4') {         return '#22a356';     } else if (process_status === '8') {         return '#f58b00ff';     } else if (process_status === '3') {         return '#266ae5ff';     } })()
